ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Tszaaz, you re killing me. ... I m at 11 and two bubbles with a ridiculously long play time for my level ... ~12 pp It gets even sadder when I look at what I m
ygData.messageBody:
Tszaaz, you're killing me.

> Level 6.5
> Play time ~2 days
I'm at 11 and two bubbles with a ridiculously long play time for my level

> Platinum: 40
~12 pp

It gets even sadder when I look at what I'm wearing:

no earrings
golden locket (gift from guild)
iron visor (guild)
patchwork scullcap
clawed knuckle ring (guild), other finger's empty
patchwork wristband
S ringmail bracelet (looted from a watchman)
S ringmail sleeves (watchman)
S ringmail gloves (watchman)
Dwarven ringmail tunic (guild)
wolf-hide belt
S raw-hide leggins
S ringmail boots (watchman)
FS dagger (watchmen)
Qeynos kite shield (guild)

> Things to buy before I am satisfied (for now):
>
> Shiny Brass Shield
> Bracer of Errolissi(sp, sorry)
> small Bronze boots
> Small bronze BP

Go on, rub salt in the wound! <g> I'd be happy with some strength jewelry,
but the +3 stuff I've seen for sale had an asking price of ~30pp, which I
haven't got. I have better gloves in the bank (black enameled something or
other ...I forget, another guild gift) and I think I've got a better hat
too, but I can't wear them as I've got only ~10 pounds to spare for loot
dressed as is. So my new plan is to head to the swap and see if I can't
replace some of my items with netted/woven/mesh.

> To sum up: this is outrageous.

I AGREE!!! And you shoulda seen what I was wearing BEFORE cleaning up after
guard campers and getting twinked by my guildmistress! I'd get invited into
groups and hear "First thing we need to do is get Ev's corpse". Confused
newbies would see me playing a lute and comment "I thought bards could wear
anything". I'd wander through the streets of Freeport and hear "May I give
you some copper please?" coming out my speakers! On the other hand getting
free & unsolicited SoW's everytime I walked in or out of a city was kinda
nice. Heh.

So uh, where is it I should take milk & muffins to and how much should I buy
FS weapons for again?

Peace
Evulia, doing everything wrong, Tunare
